title: Designing and creating a computerized payroll system on UD Super Teguh
abstract: This paper explains the writers' internship program at UD SUPER TEGUH. The program's objective is to learn and design a new payroll system using computer technology that is more efficient and effective than the old payroll system, the manual one. The first chapter of this paper is the introduction. It contains the study's background, statement of the problem, its purpose, its significance, scope and limitation, and method of the study. In chapter two, readers may find the manual payroll system's data collection and analysis. The third chapter explains the design of a new computerized payroll system to exchange the old one. In the following chapter, readers may find details about using the new payroll system. Here the writers also enclose the new system's performance. The last chapter is the conclusion and suggestion. Had also the appendix and bibliography.
contributors: Josefa Juniarti Mardijono (Advisor and Examination Committee)
source: Final Project No. 005/PBE/1996; JE Haryanto (92293022), Kusumadjaja Alie Beamto (92293023)
